name: Needle Arm
description: Your arms turn to jagged, thorny needles as you strike a creature. Make a melee attack on a creature, dealing 1d10 + MOVE grass damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is a 15 or more, the target flinches.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
